content:
Someone knows why miri complains about this code?
https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=release&edition=2018&gist=fc791324a928b87757ada49ef21d44f2

found the issue: the wrapper has size in multiple of 8 (so size_of_val % align_of_val == 0)
the inner slice doesnt have to do with anything
